title: Nature's food chain
creator_credit: Bernard Devlin and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Nature’s food is a delicately balanced system of inter-relationships. This emphasises the importance of predators in maintaining the balance of nature. Describes the three main groups of animals, herbivores, carnivores and omnivores.
